description: This file is a shell script that handles firmware download via TFTP or HTTP, verifies checksums, manages disk and partition setups, mounts filesystems, extracts boot and root filesystem images, and performs bank switching for firmware upgrades on a Raspberry Pi-based system.

methods.name: tftpDownload
methods.description: Downloads checksum and firmware files via TFTP, performs checksum verification.

methods.name: httpDownload
methods.description: Downloads checksum and firmware files via HTTP, performs checksum verification.
